data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
The XRI Resolver Library resolves an XRI to a LocalAccess URL or an
    XRIAuthority Descriptor. It can also be used to actually fetch the
    data at the LocalAccess URL. XRI is a new OASIS standard - the
    Technical Committee working on the standard is based here:
    http://www.oasis-open.org/committees/tc_home.php?wg_abbrev=xri

    This library implments much of the v1.0 specification here:
    http://www.oasis-open.org/committees/download.php/5109/xri-syntax-resolution-1.0-cd.pdf

    While I understand the reticence of PAUSE to create a new namespace
    for XRI, the closest other place it could fit would be under URI::,
    but XRI is far wider ranging.
